price: Ɛberε a ne Wura Nyankopͻn ka kyerεε no sε: “(Abraham) yε Muslim berε wo ho ase.“ Ɔkaa sε: “Mayε Muslim aberε me ho ase ama Abɔdeε nyinaa Wura no’’.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥٓ أَسۡلِمۡۖ قَالَ أَسۡلَمۡتُ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahu rabbuhu aslim qāla aslamtu lirabbi al-ʿālamīna
